class.name: ButtonScale
class.brief_description: A node component that adds hover scale animation to buttons.
class.description: ButtonScale is a node component that, when added as a child of a Button node, provides scaling animation effects on mouse hover. It supports customizable scale ratio, animation duration, and transition effects.

members.member: The scale ratio to apply when the button is hovered.
Whether to scale the button from its center point.
Whether to use tween animation for scaling.
Duration of the scaling animation in seconds.
The type of transition for the animation. Available options: Linear, Sine, Quint, Quart, Quad, Expo, Elastic, Cubic, Circ, Bounce, Back, Spring See [enum TransitionType] for detail.
The easing type for the animation. Available options: In, Out, InOut, OutIn
